title: Extinction Ivern
body: An Ivern skin where he is the harbinger of death, a tall mechanical figure roaming through forests to summon a beam to vaporize life. Daisy being replaced by an equally bulky metal enforcer to assist him in his objective.

Just a bump with another quote.

***Lands Q***
{{champion:427}} *Target acquired*

I get the whole enough with robots thing, but this skin clearly isn't just making a random character a robot skin because its incredibly easy. *"Dude what if ___ was a robot lol"*. I do agree with you guys on that. However, this skin concept actually makes sense and is creative. Its not Ivern except hes a robot. Its like an anti-Ivern, a cold, moralless, synthetic that does not care about the living.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ppQWYU2B7x8

I could see Praetorian Ivern a bit like Fiddlesticks, with the odd walk and all.
Though there are enough robot skins srsly.

Passive: Ivern scans the area around a jungle camp, similar to Sweeping Lens. When the area has been fully scanned, he disintegrates the monsters in the camp.

Q: Chains.

W: Razor wire.

E: A holographic shield.
